title: Does anyone know this font?
content:
This one has me stumped - does anyone know what font this is please?

Many thanks

Don

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [fontmock.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140712130615/http:/typophile.com/files/fontmock.jpg) | 49.13 KB |
author: webmark

comments.content: Thank you, that pointed me in the right direction. It appears that this is not in fact Philosopher, but a variation on the Philosopher font known as Yellow Magician.
